meta.name: description
meta.content: ObjectLab Kit offers free and open source Date calculators, released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Date calculator, IMM Dates, Period Calculator, Financial Calendar, Business Calendar, java, open source

section.name: DateCalc Common Introduction
section.p: DateCalc Common defines the common functionalities (implementation using some generics).
Check out the UML diagrams and JavaDocs here.
Also look at the Project Reports menu on the left for project specific items, unit tests, QA etc.
